You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
The overwhelming forces of the massive Imperial ground assault bear down upon Echo Base, and their devastating artillery will bring down the shield generator any time now.

Rebel forces scramble to evacuate as a few brave souls face the Imperial onslaught. Among them are Vil and Taya Del, two siblings from Alderaan who have fought bravely for the Alliance since even before the destruction of their homeworld.

eventActions.theText: As the main body of the assault closes in on the base, smaller squads break through the thin defensive line to attack evacuating Rebels.

You stand in the midst of the chaos, defending fleeing Rebel pilots beneath the curtain of a smaller, equally faltering shield generator.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
Nearby, an infantery gun turret has broken down under the Imperial onslaught, but it looks as if it could still fire off a few shots.

entityProperties.name: Turret 1
entityProperties.theText:
The blaster-scorched gun turret is in disrepair, but it can be coaxed into firing a few more shots.

{-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.

entityProperties.name: Turret 2
entityProperties.theText:
The blaster-scorched gun turret is in disrepair, but it can be coaxed into firing a few more shots.

{-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.

entityProperties.name: Turret 3
entityProperties.theText:
The blaster-scorched gun turret is in disrepair, but it can be coaxed into firing a few more shots.

{-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.

entityProperties.name: Turret 4
entityProperties.theText:
The blaster-scorched gun turret is in disrepair, but it can be coaxed into firing a few more shots.

{-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.

eventActions.theText: {-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.
From where you stand, the damage to the shield generator doesn't look that bad; if you can get it running properly, you might have a fighting chance to escape.

entityProperties.name: Power Station IA 1
entityProperties.theText:
This station is supposed to power the small shield generator protecting this section of the battlefield. It has faltered under the constant Imperial barrage, but it seems to be operational.

{-} A hero can interact with the power station ({I} or {J}) to try and activate it.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial Mission tokens represent inactive power stations.
{-} Rebel Mission tokens represent active power stations.
{-} A hero can interact with an inactive power station ({I} or {J}) to try and activate it.

You grab your weapons tight and brace yourself against the cold. You can do this.

{-} The mission will progress when all power stations are active.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Activate the generator power stations (&Stations active&/4).

{-} Once per activation, a Rebel figure can interact with a terminal to fire the turret.
{-} Imperial Mission tokens represent inactive power stations.
{-} Rebel Mission tokens represent active power stations.
{-} A hero can interact with an inactive power station ({I} or {J}) to try and activate it.
{-} The mission will progress when all power stations are active.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
With the shield restored, the pilots you were protecting scramble toward hangar bays containing their fighters. Scores are able to escape because of your effort.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.
{-} Heroes receive the Echo Base Troopers as allies.

eventActions.theText:
The wave of evacuating craft was met on the way to the rendezvous point by Imperial TIE fighters and was forced to divert course. The evacuees eventually found refuge in the nearby Ison system, on a planet of the same name. A mostly desolate planet, the evacuees found refuge in a mountain village called Haven, led by a man named Zotho Benex, a Rebellion sympathizer.

In the weeks following the battle, the situation grows dire. The loss of Captain Solo at Bespin has devastated morale, and the Empire continues to expand its reach.

Your primary concern, however, is the Rebel evacuees at Haven. With the Imperial presence scouring everywhere for fleeing Rebels, you've no choice but to lay low and hope that Benex and his people can be trusted.

{-} Place Story Mission card "White Noise" into play.
{-} After drawing Side Missions, shuffle all Threat Mission cards together, draw two cards from the Threat Mission deck and place them faceup with the Side Mission cards. These are now active missions.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Imperial forces overwhelm your defenses and pour through by the dozens, forcing you to retreat from the pilots you were meant to protect. In the remaining chaos, you hope that at least a few of them were able to escape.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
The wave of evacuating craft was met on the way to the rendezvous point by Imperial TIE fighters and was forced to divert course. The evacuees eventually found refuge in the nearby Ison system, on a planet of the same name. A mostly desolate planet, the evacuees found refuge in a mountain village called Haven, led by a man named Zotho Benex, a Rebellion sympathizer.

In the weeks following the battle, the situation grows dire. The loss of Captain Solo at Bespin has devastated morale, and the Empire continues to expand its reach.

Your primary concern, however, is the Rebel evacuees at Haven. With the Imperial presence scouring everywhere for fleeing Rebels, you've no choice but to lay low and hope that Benex and his people can be trusted.

{-} Place Story Mission card "Home Front" into play.
{-} After drawing Side Missions, shuffle all Threat Mission cards together, draw two cards from the Threat Mission deck and place them faceup with the Side Mission cards. These are now active missions.

globalEvents.name: Fire Turret 1
globalEvents.eventText:
A shot blasts through the icy cold air of Hoth, hitting one of your enemies. Shortly after, the turret's systems overload, frying some of its electronics.

{-} Choose a hostile figure and roll 1 red die. That figure suffers {H} equal to 1 plus the {H} results.

globalEvents.name: Turret down
globalEvents.eventText: The damaged gun turret finally breaks down completely.

eventActions.theText:
You hastily try to repair the power station.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the power station, then discard all strain tokens on the power station. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

globalEvents.name: Success PS1
globalEvents.eventText: The power station finally comes back to life. Immediately, the blue shimmer of the energy shield over the sector intensifies.

{-} A hero can interact with the power station ({I} or {J}) to try and activate it.

entityProperties.name: Power Station A1
entityProperties.theText: The power station is active, humming softly as it powers the shield generator.

globalEvents.name: Echoes defeated
globalEvents.eventText: Taya is the second to fall under the Imperial onslaught, collapsing to the ground near her brother's body whose red blood has already frozen in the icy cold. Her dead, lifeless eyes stare into the grey sky, a look of defiance still on her face. For a moment, hopelessness grips you as you stare at your fallen comrades.

globalEvents.name: A Deadly Turn
globalEvents.eventText: A thundering blast sends you sprawling. Its source, a fearsome Imperial tank, charges in your direction.

globalEvents.name: Hopes Dashed
globalEvents.eventText:
Above the chaos of the battle, welcome relief arrives in the form of another soldier in Rebel garb running toward your skirmish.

You don't recognize the grim, scarred face, and in the focus of battle, it takes a moment to register that he aims his blaster not at your enemies, but at you.

globalEvents.name: Deep Freeze
globalEvents.eventText:
The base heaters must have given out. The bitter cold of Hoth bites deeply, a burning chill that begins to sap your strength. You cannot last much longer.

{-} Heroes cannot recover {H} except from MEDICAL cards.

globalEvents.name: Fight Them Back!
globalEvents.eventText: Success! The reassuring mechanical hum of the machinery fills the air as the shield returns to full strength. The Imperial forces rush forward, determined to end this, but now cut off from any reinforcements.

globalEvents.name: Rigged to Blow
globalEvents.eventText:
As the second power station activates, suddenly a surge of electricity rushes through the stations.

{-} Choose the active power station with the most Rebel figures on or adjacent to it and roll 1 red die. Each Rebel figure on or adjacent to that power station suffers {H} equal to the {H} results and becomes <color="red">Bleeding</color>.

globalEvents.name: Final Surge
globalEvents.eventText: You are only moments away from victory. Sensing their impending defeat, the Imperial forces double their efforts.

globalEvents.name: Stations Online
globalEvents.eventText: {-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures have been defeated.
